Source.Join: left join [adaptv3system].[dbo].[country] country on country.Country_Name = u.Country
Source.Join1: left join (SELECT [Country_ID], ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [County]) CountyID, [County] FROM [adaptv3system].[dbo].[county]) county on county.County = u.County
Source.Join2: left join (SELECT [Country_ID], ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Full_Name]) StateID, [State], [Full_Name] FROM [adaptv3system].[dbo].[state]) state on state.State = u.State
Source.Join3: outer apply (SELECT top 1 * from [tempdb].[dbo].[MigrateSupport] ms where ms.OldValTable = u.Email_Address and DatabaseID is not null order by ms.Id desc) ms_UserGuid

Join: left join (select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Item_Number) ItemID, * from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[item]) as itm on itm.Item_Number = expcat.Item_Number

Source.Join: outer apply (select top 1 * from [tempdb].[dbo].[MigrateSupport] ms_u where OldValTable = u.Email_Address and ms_u.TargetServer='.' order by ms_u.Id desc) ms_u
Source.Join1: left join [adaptv3system].[dbo].[country] country on country.Country_Name = u.Home_Country
Source.Join2: left join [adaptv3system].[dbo].[lang] lang on lang.Language_Name = u.Language
Source.Join3: left join adaptv3system..userloc ul on ul.Location_Name = u.Default_Activity_Location
Source.Join4: left join (select * from adaptv3system..user_interface_prefs where Property_Key = 'MLTPHONE') uip_phone on uip_phone.User_ID = u.User_ID

Source.Join: outer apply (select top 1 * from [tempdb].[dbo].[MigrateSupport] ms_db where OldValTable = u.Email_Address and ms_db.SourceTable = '[dbo].[users]' order by ms_db.Id desc) ms_db
Source.Join1: outer apply (select top 1 * from [tempdb].[dbo].[MigrateSupport] ms_u where OldValTable = u.Email_Address and ms_u.TargetServer='.' order by ms_u.Id desc) ms_u

WhereGlobal: DatabaseID is not null and UserID is not null

Destination.Where: TenantID = {0} and (RoleName = 'Administrator' or RoleName = 'Service' or RoleName = 'Marketing' or RoleName = 'Sales')

Source.Where: TargetServer = '.' and OldValTable in (select top 1 Email_Address from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[users] where User_ID in (select User_ID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[urights] ur where ur.Right_ID = 'ADMIN'))

WhereGlobal: User_ID is not null and RoleID is not null
User_ID is not null and Role_ID is not null
User_ID is not null and Group_ID is not null

Source.Tables: (Select ColName, TaxLevelName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT 100)) TaxLevelID from(select [Tax_Level_1] ,[Tax_Level_2] ,[Tax_Level_3] ,[Tax_Level_4]FROM [adaptv3system].[dbo].[tax_levels] ) tl unpivot ( TaxLevelName for ColName in ([Tax_Level_1] ,[Tax_Level_2] ,[Tax_Level_3] ,[Tax_Level_4]) ) tl_pv) tl_pv

Source.Join: left join (select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Item_Number) ItemID, * from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[item]) as itm on itm.Item_Number = expcat.Item_Number
left join (select *, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Item_Number) ItemID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[item]) it_p on it_p.Item_Number = itc.Parent_Item_Number
Source.Join1: left join (select *, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Item_Number) ItemID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[item]) it_c on it_c.Item_Number = itc.Component_Item_Number

Source.Join: left join (select *, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Item_Number) ItemID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[item]) it_c on it_c.Item_Number = itc.Item_Number
left join (select *, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Item_Number) ItemID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[item]) it on it.Item_Number = itcp.Item_Number
Source.Join1: left join (select *,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Currency_Code]) CurrencyID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[currency_codes]) curc on curc.Currency_Code = itcp.Currency_Code

Source.Join: left join (select *, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Item_Number) ItemID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[item]) it on it.Item_Number = pt.Item_Number
Source.Join1: left join (select *,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Currency_Code]) CurrencyID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[currency_codes]) curc on curc.Currency_Code = pt.Currency_Code

Source.Join: left join adaptv3system..comptarg comptarg on comptarg.Competitor_ID = comp.Competitor_ID
Source.Join1: left join adaptv3system..compp compp on compp.Competitor_ID = comp.Competitor_ID
Source.Join2: left join adaptv3system..compourp compourp on compourp.Competitor_ID = comp.Competitor_ID

Source.Join: left join [adaptv3system].[dbo].[country] country on country.Country_Name = compco.Country
Source.Join1: left join (SELECT [Country_ID], ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [County]) CountyID, [County] FROM [adaptv3system].[dbo].[county]) county on county.County = compco.County
Source.Join2: left join (SELECT [Country_ID], ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Full_Name]) StateID, [State], [Full_Name] FROM [adaptv3system].[dbo].[state]) state on state.State = compco.State_Province

Source.Join: left join (select *,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Template_ID]) TemplateID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[label]) label on label.Template_ID = p.Default_Label_Template
Source.Join1: left join adaptv3system..userloc ul on ul.Location_Name = p.Default_Activity_Location
Source.Join2: left join [adaptv3system].[dbo].[country] mycountry on mycountry.Country_Name = p.My_Company_Country
Source.Join3: left join [adaptv3system].[dbo].[country] homecountry on homecountry.Country_Name = p.Home_Country
Source.Join4: left join (SELECT [Country_ID], ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [County]) CountyID, [County] FROM [adaptv3system].[dbo].[county]) county on county.County = p.My_Company_County
Source.Join5: left join (SELECT [Country_ID], ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Full_Name]) StateID, [State], [Full_Name] FROM [adaptv3system].[dbo].[state]) state on state.State = p.My_Company_State
Source.Join6: left join (select *,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Currency_Code]) CurrencyID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[currency_codes]) curc on curc.Currency_Code = p.Home_Currency

Source.Join: left join (select *,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Currency_Code]) CurrencyID from [adaptv3system].[dbo].[currency_codes]) curc on curc.Currency_Code = reports.Currency_Code
